== Installation ==
- First download a image <nowiki>[[#link_to_images|here]]</nowiki>

- Then download quantal-preinstalled-phablet-armhf.zip <nowiki>[[#link_to_images|here]]</nowiki>

- Place both of these files in a place where you can flash them from recovery

- Wipe data

- Then flash the cm-10.1-20130306-UNOFFICIAL-streak7.zip, and then quantal-preinstalled-phablet-armhf.zip. IN THAT ORDER. Setting GRID_UNIT_PX to 8 seems optimal for the display

- Reboot and you should be good to go, make sure to clear cache.

== Known issues ==

== The image ==
=== How to build it ===
Clone the ubuntu sources by following the first steps of the porting guide.

First clone the repositories at github.com/giveen/android_device_dell_streak7/ with the ubuntu_touch branch to device/dell/streak7 and the kernel github.com/giveen/kernel_dell_streak7 ubuntu_touch branch kernel/dell/tf101/streak7 respectively. Please also remember to clone vendor and place it in vendor/dell/streak7 github.com/giveen/android_vendor_dell_streak7

Then run . build/envsetup.sh 

Then run choosecombo release cm_streak7-userdebug && make -j{number of cores + 1} otapackage
Or you can also do brunch streak7

Your new build will be in the out directory.

=== Redistributability ===
Modified device tree:
https://github.com/giveen/android_device_dell_streak7

Now using this kernel: 
https://github.com/giveen/kernel_dell_streak7

Sources for Ubuntu are at:
http://phablet.ubuntu.com/gitweb
